meanings.definition: The quality of requiring effort or exertion.
meanings.sent1: Her painting showed great effortfulnesses in every brushstroke.
meanings.sent2: The hike up the mountain was filled with effortfulnesses.
meanings.sent3: Carrying all those books home was an effortfulnesses challenge.
meanings.sent4: The marathon tested the runners' effortfulnesses to the limit.
meanings.sent5: The sculptor's masterpiece displayed effortfulnesses in every detail.

meanings.definition: The state of being difficult or laborious.
meanings.sent1: The project's effortfulnesses made it hard to complete on time.
meanings.sent2: Cleaning the attic was a task of great effortfulnesses.
meanings.sent3: Trying to juggle all those tasks felt like a big effortfulnesses.
meanings.sent4: The maze was a true test of effortfulnesses and patience.
meanings.sent5: The journey through the dense forest was filled with effortfulnesses.

meanings.definition: The act of putting forth energy or striving.
meanings.sent1: His effortfulnesses in training paid off during the competition.
meanings.sent2: The team showed great effortfulnesses in their game.
meanings.sent3: The students' effortfulnesses in studying were truly commendable.
meanings.sent4: The artist's effortfulnesses in creating the mural were evident.
meanings.sent5: The leader's effortfulnesses inspired the team to work harder.
